messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Ask Fredrik Thordendal How's the new album coming along.
Sure—what’s Fredrik Thordendal’s contact number (or preferred messaging method) so I can send him that message?
I don't have his contact info.

It sounds like we’ll need a way to reach him first. Do you have any of the following (or a preference for one) so I can draft and send your question?

• An email address (for Fredrik or his manager)  
• A social-media handle (Twitter, Instagram, etc.)  
• A phone number  

Or would you like help finding an appropriate contact (e.g. his management or official website)? Let me know which route you’d like to take!
Can you help find a way to contact him or his management?

Here are a few practical routes you can use to get in touch with Fredrik Thordendal or his team:

1. Meshuggah’s Official Website  
   • Go to https://www.meshuggah.net and click “Contact.” There’s typically a web form or direct email for management/press inquiries.

2. Band Management / Booking Agent  
   • Email: office@meshuggah.net  
   • (If that bounces, you can also try booking inquiries via their booking agency—DDM Agency in Stockholm: booking@ddmagency.com.)

3. Record Label  
   Meshuggah releases are on Nuclear Blast. You can address an email to their press/PR department and ask to be forwarded to Fredrik’s team:  
   • info@nuclearblast.de

4. Social Media  
   Fredrik is somewhat active on Instagram and Facebook. You could send a polite direct message:  
   • Instagram: @fthordendalofficial  
   • Facebook: fb.com/fredrikthordendal  

5. LinkedIn / Professional Networks  
   If you have a LinkedIn Premium account, you may be able to find his management or booking agent and reach out directly there.

Pick whichever channel you prefer, and I can help you draft the exact message once you’ve decided. Let me know!
Alright, thanks for the options. Can you help draft a message for Instagram?

Here’s a friendly, concise Instagram DM you can send to @fthordendalofficial. Feel free to tweak any part (like adding your name or tone) before sending:

———

Hi Fredrik,

I hope you’re doing well! I’ve been following your work with Meshuggah for years and can’t wait to hear the next album. How is the writing/recording process coming along? Any sneak-peek stories or sounds you’d care to share?

Thanks for all the inspiration—and for taking the time to read this!  
Cheers,  
[Your Name]
